    Page/Post Right Sidebar

    This is a example of page/post with a sidebar on the right.

    Feeling Responsive shows metadata by default. The default behaviour can be changed via config.yml. To show metadata at the end of a page/post just add the following to front matter:

    show_meta: true

    If you don’t want to show metadata, it’s simple again:

    show_meta: false

    About Me

    I am a lecturer in physical oceanography at the University of Southamton, England. My research interests span small-scale ocean physics to large-scale dynamics of the overturning circulation. I use observations - from ships, satellites, seagliders and moorings - as well as numerical simulations to investigate the oceans. More ›
